Had a fantastic experience at this Italian restaurant! Went with my husband and little one, super kid friendly.. The pasta was absolutely delicious ‚Äî perfectly cooked and full of flavor. We also tried the tiramisu, and it was one of the best I‚Äôve had; light, creamy, and just the right amount of sweetness. The venue itself is beautiful, with a cozy and welcoming atmosphere. A special shoutout to our waiter, Ozzy Ozzy, who was so attentive throughout the evening. He gave us great recommendations from the menu and made sure everything arrived promptly. Great service really made the night. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back!

Overall, amazing vibes and super attentive service but for what it cost, the food doesn‚Äôt quite live up to the hype. Starters like the calamari and burrata salad were fresh and tasted good but nothing to write home about. I had the pappardelle beef ragu - this was comforting and tasted good but compared to my other experiences with this dish, it was alright. The chocolate bomb for dessert was great - I do really recommend this! And the complimentary limoncello shot was a nice touch.

Arrived at 6:00 on a Friday and they were busy, but luckily the host was very helpful and they were able to provide a table for 5 with no wait.
Our server Ozgur was outstanding, very attentive, with good recommendations on meals, and care to ensure everything was to our liking.
Highly recommended, but next time I will get a reservation.

We had beef carpaccio and calamari for starters, both of them were wonderful. We also ordered carbonara and porcini risotto, the carbonara was delicious and the tiramisu was great too. The service from Fozil was amazing, he was so nice and gave recommendations to us. It was a fantastic experience.

Came for dinner and the place was buzzing with activity. Despite how busy it was, the staff were incredibly helpful and efficient. Every dish we tried was delicious, but I especially recommend the prawns with artichoke and asparagus, as well as the pappardelle with beef ragu, both were outstanding. Make sure to book your table in advance, as it gets quite busy!

The staff is polite and attentive, Ozzy and his colleagues did their utmost to provide us with a wonderful eating experience.
The food was absolutely delicious - every dish was perfectly prepared and beautifully presented.
We will be back for sure!!
Faros is definitely a new favorite spot!

Have wanted to visit here for a while and got to at the weekend, it's a lovely restaurant service is brilliant, food was very good, cocktails were great! Overall a nice evening. Would definitely go back!

Fantastic Lunch at Faros Oxford Circus! ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
My husband and I had lunch at Faros Oxford Circus, and it was a wonderful experience from start to finish. The food was absolutely delicious ‚Äî fresh, flavorful, and clearly made with care. The staff were also incredibly friendly and welcoming, making the whole experience even more enjoyable. We‚Äôll definitely be coming back, and highly recommend Faros to anyone looking for great Italian food in central London.

Excellent! My Caprese was lovely but would have liked one more slice of tomato and basil rather than the leaves provided which were not as full of flavour. However the Fresh Pappardelle Beef Ragu was sensational! Not cheap but well worth it

Just had lunch. Food was amazing. The service was even better.

Ruby our host was incredible, we were celebrating our friend‚Äôs birthday and she was fantastic.
absolutely loved my dinner here! staff were super attentive and friendly, especially our waiter Jasur, and the food was absolutely delicious!

We had an amazing experience at Faros Restaurant in London! The food was absolutely delicious ‚Äì fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The atmosphere was warm and welcoming, making it a perfect spot for a relaxed evening out.

A special shoutout to Ozgur, who provided exceptional service throughout our visit. He was friendly, attentive, and made sure everything was perfect from start to finish. His recommendations were spot on, and he went out of his way to make us feel at home.

Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for great food and top-notch service. Will definitely be back soon!

I had their sourdough bread, burrata tagliatelle and tiramisu for dessert. Sourdough bread was not the best but the tagliatelle and the tiramisu were on point. My friends on the table loved their al fungi pasta and pizza. Staff were friendly and accommodative of our requests!
Love the risotto. It tastes so delicious. Highly recommended for anyone who loves Italian cuisine

Had a wonderful dinner experience at Faros last week, that made us come back for  a second dinner three days later. The team at Farros were able to accomedate us and provide us with a table within five minutes of arrival without a prior booking. Even though the restaurant was relatively full. We were served by Ozzy who took very good care of us.

I've lost count of my visits, but every time feels like the first time I fell in love with this place. Personally, the star of their menu is undoubtedly the Calamari and the Truffle Pasta! Big thanks to our waiter Eggy, who was tremendously helpful and attentive.

Lively atmosphere, open kitchen and nice small menu. The food, although on the price-y side of things, was good and worth it. But the best thing was undoubtedly the service. Everybody was really friendly and attentive.

It's a nice restaurant in central London! My friend and I made a reservation on Friday and had luck getting a table. The service was very friendly and attentive, we loved our server Asha! and the pasta was delicious. I got the burrata pasta, and it was lovely, and my friend liked her ragu a lot. This place is great for a girls' night, date night, or small group dinner; I highly recommend it!

We had such a wonderful meal here! The food was so tasty, and Mehmet really made our experience special. He was super attentive and took care of every little detail ‚Äî we felt very well looked after. Thank you so much!
We enjoyed our dinner. Our waitress was top notch and the food was great. The atmosphere was pleasant and went above what was expected.

I had an incredible dining experience at Paros. The food was absolutely amazing‚Äîevery dish was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. What truly made the evening special was the outstanding service from Jass and Ruby. They were attentive, friendly, and went above and beyond to make sure everything was perfect. Highly recommend Paros for anyone looking for a top-tier meal and excellent hospitality!

My Wife and I were in London for a few days and saw this place on Google maps. It's entirely deserving of its high score! The service was excellent, food was absolutely delicious and sitting on the street outside gives a great vibe also.

Had an amazing experience at FAROS Oxford Circus on my birthday! A special shoutout to Jass for his stupendous and excellent customer service ‚Äî he truly went above and beyond to make the day extra special. Thank you for the warm hospitality and for making it a memorable celebration! And oooh the mocktails that created for me were just amazing! I had 3 of those.. back to back! I‚Äôm forever a customer. Thanks FAROS, Thanks Jass!

Such a vibe in there. FANTASTIC service (shout out to Yeliz) I'd definitely pop in here again. Food came in good time and it was a great place to catch up with mates and we didn't feel rushed to leave which is always a bonus.

Last week, during our visit to London, we had the opportunity to experience this highly talked-about restaurant, which we had also come across on social media. As Manchester residents who frequently travel to London, discovering new culinary gems is always exciting for us. From the moment we stepped in, we were impressed by the restaurant‚Äôs beautifully designed and welcoming atmosphere.

I would particularly like to highlight the service‚Äî√ñzg√ºr looked after us exceptionally well, making our experience feel even more special. The presentation of the dishes was modern and creative, yet the authenticity of traditional flavours remained intact. Every dish was a perfect blend of high-quality ingredients and expert craftsmanship, showcasing a true passion for gastronomy.

This restaurant exceeded our expectations in both taste and service. Without a doubt, we will be returning on our next visit to London. I highly recommend it to fellow food enthusiasts!

I had a great experience here! Mehmet was incredibly friendly and made us feel so welcome from the whole time through . The food was absolutely amazing‚Äîespecially the tiramisu, which was one of the best I‚Äôve ever had in London. Excellent service and delicious food‚Äîhighly recommend this place!

I recently visited this restaurant with my girlfriend, and we had a fantastic experience from start to finish. The atmosphere was warm and welcoming, and the service was truly top-notch.

A special mention goes to Ozzy, who served us ‚Äî his attention to detail, friendly attitude, and professionalism really elevated our evening. He made sure everything was perfect throughout our meal.

The food was delicious and well-presented, living up to the standards of fine dining. Every dish was flavorful and satisfying, and we left feeling very happy with the overall experience.

Highly recommend this place if you‚Äôre looking for great food and excellent service. We‚Äôll definitely be coming back!

We celebrated my friend‚Äôs birthday here and had an amazing experience! The food was absolutely delicious, and everything we ordered was perfect. A huge shoutout to Ozgur, who took care of us‚Äîhe was incredibly kind and thoughtful. He helped us light the birthday candles, took lovely photos for us, and really made the celebration special. The service was outstanding and made the whole evening even more memorable. Highly recommend this place, and thank you again to Ozgur for the wonderful service!

It's a good experience and the service is very good. Shrimp and squid rings are especially recommended for food, which are crispy on the outside and tender on the inside. The location is also good. It is very close to the subway station and worth visiting, and Ailcan gave us a free lemon wine.

The restaurant experience was great! Mehmet was very patient and the food was excellent, especially the black truffle risotto. Mehmet finished the meal by handing us two glasses of Limoncello. Thank you very much for his service.

Mushroom pasta - absolutely mouth watering. Crisp bread and butter to start with. Two different by the glass wines tasted - malbec and chianti - both good. Plus efficient service and a nice table outside - overall a very good experience!

Very authentic flavour and menu. Pleased to see affogato was on the menu and there were a variety of options for those who do not eat meat. The hostess was very attentive and she did a great job supporting Ruby and the other members of staff. Very easy to locate from Oxford Circus tube station.

Had the most incredible dinner here! The food was absolutely amazing‚Äîevery dish was full of flavor and beautifully presented. From the fresh burrata to the crispy calamari, everything tasted perfect. The vibe was magical, especially sitting outside as the sun set, and the service was top-notch. Huge shoutout to our waiter Mehmet who was so friendly and really made the experience even better. Highly recommend‚Äîwill definitely be coming back!

This restaurant is the best in London! I had a great night here with my friend. We‚Äôd love to order some desert but we are too full. The service was also fantastic. Thank you, Jass and Eggy. We‚Äôd love to come again sometime! <3

We ate at Faros for the first time today and were thrilled with the service we received from Jass. Jass was Perfect. It was very attentive, courteous, and friendly. The food, ambiance, and service are absolutely worth the price.

Went to this restaurant couple of weeks ago. Great place - fresh delicious food, nice atmosphere and friendly service.
We were served by Mehmet who was really attentive and made us feel comfortable and welcome.

Dined here Friday night for my wife‚Äôs 30th birthday celebrations. The food was out of this world and all the staff there were incredibly friendly and attentive, especially Yeliz who was just fantastic. Food is very fairly priced for the quality you are getting. Will definitely be back next time we are in London

We wanted to hate this place. The reviews can‚Äôt be true. Impossible for central London to be 4.9** but honestly.

Starter perfect, pesto great. Burrata fresh and not straight out the fridge.

Truffle pasta creamy and rich. Ragu plentiful and delicious. The desserts were also just lovely and light and the coffee was amazing.

Service also top notch and a song for my partners birthday was such a nice touch!

The food here is always amazing! I come here all the time and usually order the pasta and prawns. I‚Äôm quite picky with flavours, so it‚Äôs hard for me to find pasta and prawns that I really enjoy, but every time I get them here they‚Äôre made perfectly for me. Ozzy  is always very respectful and welcoming he makes my time here feel warm and enjoyable.

This place deserves 5 stars! Delicious food and outstanding service

We were impressed by OZGUR professionalism and warm demeanor.
They truly enhanced our dining experience

Went on a Friday evening for an early dinner. We had a great time. The place itself has great decor, with open kitchen and bar. We shared all the dishes- Burrata salad, garlic bread, pizza and two pastas.

The menu offers great variety for vegetarians. There are plenty of dishes to choose from and could add extra ingredients to dishes if it was possible.

We were served by Ozgur. He was attentive and helpful.

Great traditional Italian restaurant at the heart of London!

Nice service too and highly recommend.

My partner and I had a great experience at Faros this evening. Top class service from all staff, but especially Asma who was incredibly attentive and made our experience that little bit more special. The Tiramisu in particular was outstanding.

My girlfriend and I had such an incredible experience here tonight. From the moment we walked in, finding a table was smooth and welcoming, and the entire staff went out of their way to make us feel comfortable.

The biggest shout out goes to our server, Ruby. She‚Äôs an absolute rockstar‚Äîone of those rare people who truly elevates the entire experience. Attentive, kind, and full of great energy, she made the night feel like so much more than just dinner.

The food was fantastic, but it was Ruby and the team who turned it into a night we‚Äôll remember. We‚Äôll definitely be back!

I had an amazing experience at Faros and a big part of that was thanks to the waiter, Jarus From the moment I sat down, he was warm, welcoming, and incredibly attentive without being overbearing. His positive energy genuinely made the meal feel special.

It's rare to come across someone who clearly takes pride in their service and genuinely cares about the customer‚Äôs experience. Jasur went above and beyond ‚Äî and because of him, I‚Äôll definitely be coming back.

Highly recommend asking for him if you visit!

The food was simply delicious, each dish bursting with flavor and beautifully presented. The atmosphere was warm and inviting, making the dining experience even more enjoyable. Ozzy‚Äôs friendly and attentive service made the evening truly special ‚Äî he was quick to anticipate our needs and added a personal touch that made us feel at home. Highly recommended!

I recently had the pleasure of dining at Faros, and I must say, it was an experience that truly stood out. From the moment I walked in, the classy yet homely atmosphere created an inviting and comfortable environment. The d√©cor strikes a perfect balance between elegance and warmth, making it ideal for both special occasions and a refined, casual meal.

To start, I ordered the minestrone soup, which was absolutely delicious. The broth was rich and well-seasoned, with a generous variety of fresh vegetables that gave it both texture and depth of flavor. The soup was served with bread, though I did find myself wishing for a bit of butter to accompany it ‚Äì a small touch that would have made the starter perfect.

For the main course, I opted for the fresh pappardelle beef ragu, and I can confidently say it was one of the best pasta dishes I‚Äôve ever had. The pappardelle itself was cooked to perfection ‚Äì tender with just the right amount of bite ‚Äì while the beef ragu was bursting with flavor. The sauce was rich, hearty, and clearly made with high-quality ingredients, creating a dish that was both comforting and indulgent.

Given the quality of the food and the overall high-end feel of the restaurant, the prices were on the higher side, but that‚Äôs to be expected for a place of this caliber. Honestly, considering the taste and presentation, I felt the meal was well worth the cost.

Service was another highlight of the evening. The staff were exceptionally friendly, attentive without being overbearing, and the food arrived impressively quickly. It‚Äôs clear that Faros prides itself not just on its menu but on delivering a complete dining experience.

Overall, my visit to Faros was outstanding. The combination of delicious food, quick and friendly service, and a classy yet cozy ambiance makes it a place I‚Äôd highly recommend. If you‚Äôre looking to treat yourself to an unforgettable meal, this is definitely the spot to visit.
Delicious food and exceptional service‚ÄîJass was friendly, attentive, and made us feel truly welcome.

We had a great dinner and a great service by Miss Ruby today August 13 and the service was great. The food was tasty. We had risotto with seafood as well as Margherita pizza and also calamari and Melanie‚Äôs chicken. But what makes our food is good is the service and miss Ruby that she was very Smiling and taking care of us all the time. We will come back again and have dinner here again.

Food was average and served in small portion‚Äîover priced as suggested by other comments. The service was adequate and commercial, but certainly not charming or personable. Atmosphere was mediocre. Unfortunately, superficial comes to mind to describe Faros.
Good food and excellent service! Our server Eggy was very attentive and made the whole experience even better.

Highly Recommend!

Me and my friend were waited by Maryam this evening, A lovely waitress, and outstanding service. Food was beautiful, as were drinks. We Will definitely re-visit again!
The food is amazing. Recommend the Fresh truffle pasta. Jass gave us great service!

Yummy food, superb ambience, and great service from Ozgur.
I had the best Carbonara ever.
I will be back.

It‚Äôs a great place to get some nice food and get a break from a busy Oxford Street while still staying central.
The atmosphere is really nice and the staff is very attentive and always happy to help without being too much which I did appreciate.
We went on a Friday evening and booked a table on the same day, but considering it‚Äôs a busy place and all the tables were full, I would recommend booking at least few days in advance.
Me and my friend got margarita pizza and truffle pasta which we both think were great. Portions size was also decent for the price.
I would recommend, it is a very pretty place with a chill atmosphere.

Never been here in 40 yrs of coming to London but so pleased we found it. The food was fantastic and despite bring a hot day it was lovely and cool inside. Service was first class and we were asked if everything was OK at appropriate times, without being pushy.
All in all a fantastic place to dine and will definitely return. Thankyou for a lovely meal.

This place was such a pleasant surprise, as I hadn‚Äôt heard much about it and had chosen it randomly. The food, service and atmosphere were just fantastic, feels rare to get all 3 these days. Can‚Äôt wait to eat here again, I had a great time.

As far as food and service goes - it‚Äôs excellent.

As far as portion sizes for the price tag - afraid on the pricier side.

The mains are ¬£27 - ¬£30 and we left hungry. To be honest - we should have seen the menu and prices before committing to a casual Sunday lunch!

This place can be easily ¬£60 per head if you include a starter, main and a drink.

Would I come again? YES! But I need to find an occasion! Not a casual lunch

Excellent restaurant close to Oxford Street. I have visited here several times and have always had an excellent experience. The food is very good and the restaurant has a great atmosphere and whilst it can get very busy it doesn't get overly noisy.

Service is excellent (and they only added on 5% service to the bill!). A particular shout out to Asma who was exceptional on my last visit (20th November), nothing was too much trouble and she made a real fuss of one of guests who was 93 which was really appreciated.

I would definitely recommend a visit here and will be returning again soon

We had a fantastic dinner in Faro. Our waiter Ruby was so helpful in her recommendations and had a very warm and welcoming presence. She was so kind and helpful with any requests we had. The food and drink was excellent. Will definitely be returning.

Faros is a gem - a real find.

We were celebrating my birthday with a visit to the Palladium, so we did some research into good restaurants nearby for a pre-theatre supper and immediately noted how highly rated Faros was across the board.  We therefore booked, never having visited before and hoping for the best.

We need not have worried as we had an absolutely outstanding evening in every way: starting with stunningly devised signature cocktails, our party of four went on to enjoy a range of quite superb dishes, perfectly prepared and presented with great care and skill, subtle yet full of flavour and colour, complemented by an excellent wine list, and all supported by what felt to us like exemplary service that was both attentive without fuss and constantly smiling and friendly.  The whole thing reached a climax when my ice cream arrived with a birthday candle in it and three of the team serenaded us with 'Happy Birthday'.  As others have remarked, the warm atmosphere created by the staff really is a feature.

The restaurant is also delightfully situated on a corner of Gt Portland Street and Margaret St, with surrounding windows as a feature that make for an interior ambience ideally balanced between light airiness and cosy intimacy.

We were amazed not to have visited before, and look forward to returning - perhaps next time making the meal rather than the theatre the centre of the evening.

We will remember it as the perfect celebration we had hoped for, memorable for all the right reasons and exceptionally happy.  I only wish we had taken some pictures to illustrate this review.

We could not have asked for more, or better, in every way - and nor was it excessively expensive.

We can highly recommend Faros without hesitation.  Truly first class.
Had a really good dinner with my mom. Linguine Allo Scoglio tastes so good! Big thanks to Fozil for his really good service!
Óóä

Bill‚Äôs Soho Restaurant is a fantastic place that I highly recommend in the heart of London. I visited for a late breakfast (brunch), and it was an excellent experience from start to finish. The food was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented ‚Äì I tried the eggs with sides, and everything tasted perfect. The restaurant has a cozy, stylish atmosphere with a mix of modern and classic d√©cor, making it a great spot for friends or family. The staff were friendly, attentive, and provided quick service with a smile, which made the visit even more enjoyable. A must-try in Soho!

Food was very good. Recommend the porridge and the eggs Benedict. The ham they used is great. As an essentially vegetarian person i made an exception for it.
Service was good not exceptional bit no complaints.
Love the atmosphere. Always visit when in London.

Delicious eggs, avocado and mushrooms.
Welcoming atmosphere with great relaxing music.
The place to be for a healthy breakfast in the core of London.
So accommodating to our dietary needs too üòâ
And good news: prices are fair and you won‚Äôt be ripped off ü§©

Bill‚Äôs food is always great and I do enjoy sitting their restaurants. However, perhaps it was the weekend and it was in soho, the tables were crowded together. I found it difficult to squeeze into my seat as there is no space between my chair and the table. The waiter had to hand everything to us from behind as there was no way he could walk to our table.

This place is amazing!
Lovely decor and amazing food (I already want to go again!). Staff was really nice
I recommend booking just in case

My husband and I had a great experience at Bills. Our waitress Dora was extremely knowledgeable about the menu and was incredibly helpful when it came to helping me with my allergies. They have an entire gluten free menu which was incredible and made me feel very safe eating there. I got the vegan and gluten free pancakes and they were delicious. My husband who does not have any allergies got the eggs royal and he said they were very good as well. This was a great place to eat if you have allergies or not!

I had a fantastic experience at Bill‚Äôs in Westfield Shepherd‚Äôs Bush. From the moment we arrived, the service was outstanding. We were looked after by Clem, who was attentive, friendly, and made us feel really welcome  truly amazing service.

The atmosphere was warm and inviting, perfect for a relaxed meal. I ordered the chargrilled 8oz sirloin steak with rosemary fries, which was cooked to perfection  juicy, flavorful, and beautifully presented. My partner had a burger, and it was just as impressive: delicious, perfectly seasoned, and generously portioned.

The food was exemplary, the service top-notch, and the overall experience left us both very happy. I‚Äôd highly recommend Bill‚Äôs Shepherd‚Äôs Bush to anyone looking for great food and excellent hospitality. We‚Äôll definitely be coming back!

Evening meal party of four, with two starters and four mains. Service was good, but only one server for a number of tables led to delays at certain times. The food was good, but needed better spice balance. We enjoyed the prawn starter, very nicely done, followed by a burger, Caesar salad, fish pie, and shawarma. These were also well prepared. Oddly enough, the shawarma came at least 5 minutes prior to the other mains. In addition, we had to wait a while for a cocktail to be re-made (15 minutes).

We enjoyed the atmosphere and think this might‚Äôve been just an off night for our table

I had an incredible experience with a truly remarkable team! Their outstanding service made every moment unforgettable. I want to give a special shout-out to the manager, Kat, whose energy and dedication were nothing short of inspiring. If you're looking for the perfect place to celebrate a special occasion, I wholeheartedly recommend this venue. They'll make your party an event to remember!

Staff are really friendly and attentive, and the restaurant is very clean, with a nice atmosphere. Dora was our server and was super attentive and helpful. We ordered a big brunch plate, the biscoff pancakes, and the maple bacon pancakes. All were super filling, nicely presented, and delicious. Biscoff pancakes could use a bit more syrup, but the vanilla cream was delicious. Coffee was okay, nothing out if this world, though there is a big attention to detail in terms of types of milk used and teas.
We passed by and decided to eat here. Great experience. Our waitress Katherine is great and service customer is definitely her thing. There are plenty of options in the menu. I Highly recommend.

Loved our meal here! Great food, great service! Friendly fun atmosphere. Gorgeous welcome from staff from walking in, table service from Mo. Good choice of vegan and vegetarian alongside meat dishes for non-veggie friends.

The service and food was brilliant, one of our party has celiac disease, and it's very rare that we can all find a place we can all enjoy a meal together, this restaurant offers its own menu for gluten free meals and they were amazing, I would definitely recommend this restaurant. well done for making a difference

Great food! Beautiful interior, nice staff.

Our server was Yolanda! Very nice and gave us fast and good service, plus a little chat at the end about our time in england! ‚ù§Ô∏è

I had a great time at Bill‚Äôs earlier this Saturday evening. Been to other branches before, but this one is beyond my favourite. Massive thank you to the team: Francesco, Paolo, Martina and Yolanda for making my day. I recommend the strawberry margarita, will definitely be back.

We had our first breakfast in London at Bill's cause it was right next to our hotel and both the food and the service were excellent. Particularly our waitress Kushi who was extraordinary kind and patient with our girl's eternal doubts deciding which pancakes she wanted. Thanks a lot!

I recently visited Bill's Restaurant and had an absolutely fantastic experience! From the moment I walked in, the hospitality was exceptional. The staff was warm, welcoming, and genuinely attentive, making sure every aspect of my dining experience was flawless.

As someone who needs to follow a gluten-free diet, I was especially impressed by how considerate and knowledgeable the team was about their gluten-free menu options. They took the time to go over everything with me, ensuring that all my needs were met without any hassle.

The highlight of the meal was the vegan food platter‚Äîit was, without a doubt, the best I've had so far! Each dish was thoughtfully prepared, bursting with fresh flavors, and beautifully presented. It was a true celebration of plant-based cuisine, and I left feeling completely satisfied and energized.

To top it all off, I received a generous discount, making the whole experience even more enjoyable. Great food, top-tier service, and a welcoming atmosphere‚ÄîI'll definitely be back and highly recommend Bill's Restaurant to anyone looking for a memorable meal!

We were hungry, and this place hit the spot. Although it was reasonably busy, the service was fast and friendly, and the food came in good time.
Everything was lovely, and being modern, we paid the bill using the QR code on the table, so no waiting for bills, etc
Very quick service, all of the waiters were very kind and helpful. Food was amazing. Large choice of drinks. We will definitely return in the future

Fantastic food, exceptional gluten-free options‚Äî-in fact, there was an entirely separate menu for those with gluten allergies. The eggs Benedict dish (not gluten free) was amazing, but our server, Rose, was even better. Delightful, attentive, and friendly. Give Rose a raise. If you can. Rose deserves it.
Friendly staff and fun unusual decor. Nice menu with wide range of options. Burger was great
Dora was great!! Very helpful with the menu and making sure I was good with everything between my meals! Everything was flavor but the cinnamon donuts was amazing!!!
Lovely evening at Bills in Soho. Amazing armosphere, delicious food and exceptional service from our waiter, Mo. Thanks for a special birthday meal.

Absolutely! Here's that review from your perspective:
Wow, Bill's Soho in London became my absolute favorite place to eat in the entire city. It was the perfect spot to dine with my family, and honestly, the best of all the places we tried. The attention we received was just amazing ‚Äì everyone was so kind and attentive, making us feel truly welcome. And the food? Oh my goodness, it was absolutely delicious! Every single dish was a delight, and I'm still thinking about how incredible it all tasted. If I ever have the chance to visit London again, you can bet the first place I'll be heading is straight back to Bill's Soho for another bite of their incredible food. It's an experience I won't soon forget!

A lovely restaurant In a great location. A real good menu with enough choice to satisfy the pickiest of eaters. I was in the mood for a delicious burger, and it did not disappoint. A nice range of cocktails, and juices too that will be guaranteed to put a smile on your face. I recommend you give this a try on your next adventure out.

We had a pre-theatre dinner and the food was great, it just took a bit longer to arrive than expected, but Saeed noticed without us needing to 'complain' about it and he made our dining experience at Bill's Soho absolutely wonderful!!
Service was so fast and all staff were attentive . Kushi our server made us feel welcome and was very helpful ! 10/10 reccomend !

It's a nice place with good service and food. They don't rush you or try to push the daily specials into you.
I had Eggs Benedict with a side of fried potatoes and an Eton Colada Sundae both of which were very nice.
Overall, reasonable value for the money.

Currently I work at bill's victoria so I'm quite familiar with the food I'm going to be ordering, I just wanted to try the chefs special dishes, was sat down by a great waiter who name I didn't get unfortunately, I'll describe him as very chill but understanding and respectful, white guy with a full beard, hair tied up and I think he had tattoos, yeah him, he was great. Food was as good as it looked, and it looked great. Not much else to say other than it was a great visit, would definitely recommend coming here, with friends, especially on Fridays during 3-5 pm üòâüòÅüëçüèæ

Worst service from the staff. I sat by myself, unfortunately, thinking I could as no one was around to sit me and there were no signs stating to wait to be seated. Anyways, I‚Äôm not sure if that got one of the server, a lady who wasn‚Äôt wearing a uniform like the rest, to be unfriendly towards me. I ordered and not a word of hi, thanks etc while she was going around greeting and being nice to other diners, which to me seems deliberate and immature if her intentions was to spike me.

And when it came to serving, not a smile, thank you and she served my food and drink over the seat instead of standing next to me like most decent restaurant/diners would.

Please avoid at all cost, and to protect your sanity and wallet if you‚Äôre a foreigner. They won‚Äôt treat you kindly. And in case you‚Äôre wondering, I was smiling the whole time, and was nice to her like a normal human being would do. And she‚Äôs in a service line, no reason to be rude at all. If I could give a zero, I would. Again, stay away from this diner. We are all paying customers, be nice and courteous. And be a human

Dora was our amazing server today. She was very attentive, friendly and went above and beyond to make our meal a greay experience. The meal was not rushed, the food was very tasty and she remembered drinks orders and allergies on second orders without being reminded and continued to bring tap water without being asked. Highly recommend and she made the meal and evening a lovely experience.

We visited Bill's after our Theatre trip and it was really nice. The food was delicious and the service fantastic. All of the staff I encountered were friendly, welcoming,  efficient and professional.

Our server, Yolanda, was brilliant aswell - nothing was too much trouble.

Thank you for a lovely evening :-)

Food was ok, ambiance wasn't bad, located in a central area and not too pricey too.
Best part was meeting family over the food ‚ù§Ô∏è üòç

I recently had breakfast at Bill's, and overall, it was a pleasant experience. The food was tasty and nicely presented, with a traditional English feel to the ambiance which added a lovely touch to the meal. However, the dishes were served somewhat lukewarm, and I felt they could have benefited from a bit more seasoning. Despite that, it was still an enjoyable experience, and I'd consider going back for the cozy atmosphere.

We had dinner here and Yolanda provided great service. She was professional, attentive, knowledgeable, friendly and gave us great recommendations. The chips were tasty, didn‚Äôt love the duck. Finally love how Yolanda is bilingual.

Welcoming atmosphere with great relaxing music.

The place to be for a healthy breakfast in the core of London.
So accommodating to our dietary needs too.
Delicious eggs, avocado and mushrooms. I liked the Plant plate most, I order online so many times.

We visited for breakfast on a sunny morning in London. The big windows were all open and it was a very pleasant atmosphere. We all enjoyed a variety of dishes full cooked breakfast, pancakes, gluten free pancakes and vegan pancakes. All the food was delicious and very filling. Service was friendly and helpful.

Bill‚Äôs Soho Restaurant delivered an outstanding dining experience from start to finish! The warm welcome and attentive service (shout-out to Katherine, our lovely waitress!) set the tone for a memorable meal. As someone who values gluten-free options, I was thrilled to see a dedicated menu‚Äîrarely do restaurants cater so thoughtfully to dietary needs.

The Modern European dishes were creative and delicious, with fresh ingredients shining through. The atmosphere struck the perfect balance between lively and cozy, ideal for both brunch with friends and intimate dinners. Prices (¬£20-30 for dinner) were very reasonable for the quality.

Highlights:
‚ú® Standout gluten-free choices (a full separate menu‚Äîimpressive!)
‚ú® Friendly, efficient staff who went the extra mile
‚ú® Vibrant yet relaxed vibe in a prime Soho location

Already planning my next visit‚Äîhighly recommend!

I was recently contacted by someone offering me $5 to leave a fake 5-star review for Bill‚Äôs Soho. I refused, but it‚Äôs concerning that this is happening.

Please be cautious when reading reviews here ‚Äì not all of them may be genuine. I wanted to share this so people know the reality and can make informed decisions.

Dined at Bill's in Soho recently and had a wonderful time! The food was delicious, with the duck curry being a standout.

Our waitress, Patricia, was absolutely fantastic. She was so helpful, friendly, and genuinely kind. Patricia offered excellent menu recommendations, was incredibly attentive without being intrusive, and made our dining experience truly enjoyable.

We'll definitely be back soon.

Bill's Soho

Located in the heart of Soho, Bill's offers a lively atmosphere perfect for any meal.

We began with the signature Nachos, loaded with cheese and guacamole, bursting with flavor. For the main course, the Buttermilk Fried Chicken Burger was exceptional‚Äîcrispy and tender, served with sweet potato fries that were perfectly seasoned.

We topped off our meal with a warm Chocolate Fondant, rich and gooey, paired beautifully with vanilla ice cream.

The staff was friendly and attentive, making our experience enjoyable. Bill's Soho is a must-visit for delicious food and a fun vibe!

Have been to Bill‚Äôs several times before and loved it. I have always ordered the sea bass which is great but this time I took the recommendation of Marco. And went for the truffle chicken 2ways which was fantastic!

Marco was a great host and really recommend this place which has a great atmosphere right in the heart of Soho.

Dan was an amazing guy, he truly made our families 33rd anniversary something special. The experience alone is what made the night but they were able to back it with great food and great drinks. 10/10 would recommend.

I love the Bill's Restaurants very much. Whenever I'm in London a Stop for a Breakfast at Bill's is a must. I've been at the Soho Bill's for the Second time. This time I traveled with a friend and introduced her to Bill's. She's a vegan and was also very happy with the offers and food.
Big thanks to Paolo for the friendly service! I'm totally coming back!

I like this place from the receptionist Olivia she was super hospitable and warm to the waiter Pablo. We ordered
pancak biscoff  ice cream. üç® ü•û
Halloumi starters  üßÄ
Orange juice  üçä
Try it whenever you are in Soho specially if you‚Äôre craving pancakes

I had brunch here daily during my stay in London, spending around ¬£10‚Äì¬£20 each time. The atmosphere was calm and quiet, making it a perfect spot to relax or have an easy conversation without shouting over noise. Service was efficient ‚Äî I never had to wait long for my meal. The food was consistently fresh and delicious, and the friendly staff made every visit feel welcoming. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a peaceful brunch spot in Soho.
Hands down one of the best meals ever! Killer burgers, freezing cold beer, and outstanding service. You guys crushed it ‚Äî big thanks to our awesome server. MO THANK YOU ! !
A perfect evening! Warm welcome, impeccable service‚Ä¶ Huge thanks to Francisco who took great care of us with real class. We‚Äôll be back with no hesitation!

Really nice looking place. Comfy seating with a lounge type feel to the place. We were there for late breakfast. Sweet and savoury pancakes, stack of 3 or 5 , your choice, I had vegan breakfast, all very nicely presented, good coffee. Really nice menu. I recommend that you try it out. We returned the following day for more.

I recently dined at boho and it was a great experience .

Ambiance:
The atmosphere was cozy with  comfortable seating. It felt welcoming and the vibe really added to the experience.

Service:
The staff was friendly/slow/uninterested], and the service was quick.

Food:
The menu had a great selection-and everything we ordered was delicious
Highlights included

Value for Money:
Prices were[reasonable ,Portion sizes were generous, and I felt satisfied.

Overall Rating will be 5/5

I had brunch there and it was really nice. The place had a cozy, relaxed vibe and wasn‚Äôt too crowded. The food was fresh and tasty. The coffee was great too, and the service was friendly and fast.

Overall, it was a lovely spot for a casual brunch. I‚Äôd definitely go back!

Overview: Chain restaurant with a large range of dish offerings.

Pros‚úÖ: The decor of the restaurant is nice, homely and gives good ambience. Large choice of dishes on the menu to choose from. The waiters that served us were friendly and accommodating

Cons‚ùå: The food was disappointing. The flavour of the korean cauliflower was good but the cauliflower was undercooked. The aubergine parmigiana had really bad parmesan that tasted off and the aubergine skin was burnt and bitter. Their card machine also does not accept Revolut.
Thank you very much Esra for the friendly service you provided. We had a great breakfast experience.
I have allergies and intolerances and the menu has so many options! I got the brunch plate which was really nice. My server Dora was super helpful, kind and went the extra mile.

we walked by this place several times it wasn‚Äôt real busy and I thought I wanted to try it so we went back but when we went back, it was gay pride weekend. The food was unique and delicious. The service was great considering they were packed and the other reason I gave them a four with atmosphere is because it was crowded. We got still a lovely table sitting on the open window and I love watching the crowds going by.
This was the best food we have had in a long time since moving here, will definitely be back service was amazing & food was fresh !
Food was great! Fun and lively atmosphere. Dan is the MAN! Took care of us for my parents 33rd wedding anniversary and couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience! Until next time!

Great atmosphere here, nicely busy but plenty of space around where we were seated, so not cramped, we ate from the lunchtime specials, 3 courses for ¬£21.50.  Excellent value for money, proper full sized portions which we weren‚Äôt expecting. Super tasty food and excellent coffee too, and a novelty for London to find the toilets are on the ground floor.
Glad we came in here pre theatre, perfect restaurant today, thank you

Fantastic experience! The food was delicious, and the atmosphere warm and inviting. Francesco provided outstanding service ‚Äî friendly, attentive, and professional. Martina at the bar impressed us with her amazing cocktails and great energy. Their hospitality truly made the evening special. Highly recommended!

Dora provided outstanding service for me and my wife on valentine's day, left full of delicious food and had a relaxing time - super helpful with the gluten free options, unfortunately my meal came out with onions which I'd requested without, Dora noticed straight away and took it back and got it sorted no fuss and super quick, she was really attentive and made the whole experience brilliant, thank you

Bill‚Äôs Soho offers a cozy, relaxed atmosphere in the heart of London, perfect for a casual brunch, lunch, or dinner. The menu features a mix of modern British comfort food with a few global twists ‚Äî think hearty burgers, fresh salads, and seasonal specials. Standouts include the buttermilk chicken burger and the indulgent triple chocolate brownie. Service is generally friendly and efficient, though it can get busy during peak hours. A reliable spot for good food, decent prices, and a warm, inviting vibe.
Fantastic service by Dani! The sticky toffee pudding is so good! The salad sizes are generous.
Loved it for dinner, CRISPY STICKY DUCK, DUCK CURRY and STICKY TOFFEE PUDDING. Followed next morning for breakfast EGGS BENEDICT.

I had some of the bottomless pancakes today at Bills and had a very enjoyable experience, they were quite busy but Mo attended to me as quickly as he could and made my experience a good one. I would definitely come back again with friends

Lovely atmosphere and the staff were great although incredibly busy.

I ordered the spiced tortilla (which I wasn‚Äôt expecting to be tortilla chips) and I did enjoy it.

I also got the Caesar salad which was really really disappointing. The dressing was watery and flavourless. Although the salad was presented nicely and the chicken was cooked really well the dressing just made everything soggy and pooled at the bottom like soup.
I was expecting the elderflower lemonade to be more exciting as well considering it was ¬£4.50 but it was just soda water and a syrup rather than something prebottled (which is what you would expect for the price).

I had an okay experience.

Great brunch spot! I ordered the scrambled eggs and pancakes, and both were absolutely delicious. The eggs were fluffy and well-seasoned, and the pancakes were soft and perfectly sweet. Highly recommend if you‚Äôre looking for a tasty and satisfying brunch.

This is the third year in a row that we‚Äôre spending our December holiday in London. The breakfast at Bill‚Äôs has left a lasting impression on us, along with the always friendly and relaxed service attitude. We fondly remember the fun waiter Dora from previous years, as well as other members of the staff.

I recently visited Bill's Restaurant at saturday and had a fantastic experience!the hospitality and staff was warm.
I had a burger there,that wasnt the best but that was good.
The restaurant is hot and they have to use cooler inside.
Lovely brunch at Bill's. Second visit and both times friendly and attentive staff. Food was really good quality and nice and hot.

Popped into Soho and we couldn‚Äôt have had a better waitress!
Roshanna, was so attentive and chatty!
And the brunch martini was lovely!!
Thank you!!

First time here prior to a show at the Apollo.

No wait time, nice food and drink selection, courteous and helpful staff, enjoyed our meal and drink enormously!

Will return asap

The food wasn't that good to be honest, but not bad either. We had English breakfast and Eggs Benedicte. Both had a very plain taste unfortunately. They totally forgot to salt and season the food. After that we had the famous pancake stack.
The pancakes itself was plain, almost dry, but the topping was incredibly good. We would have liked more toppings since it wasn't enough to cover up for the dry pancakes. The coffee wasn't anything to write home about either.

Friendly staff and they were quick to help with anything you might need.

The atmosphere inside this restaurant is incredible! So cool, so cozy and relaxing. Vibrant but still not loud.
Never had such a haloumi burger neither fish pie. You guys have mastered the cooking. Though it was busy but they have managed ambient atmosphere. Staff and serving was awesome.

What a cool place with funky decor and music. Service was pretty prompt given how busy it was. The menu is really extensive catering to all appetites. My burgers was divine but the eggs weren‚Äôt a favourite of the other guests. Relatively pricey however given the location, it‚Äôs to be expected. ‚ÄúKids eat free‚Äù available although unsure of the details so check this out.
The food was lovely and it exceeded my expectations. Will come back again. Food service was quick and it was very clean. Highly recommended!

My friend and I are visiting from the states and stopped in for dinner. Yolanda was an amazing server making sure we got everything we needed for our meal. The food is impeccable, the vibe of the restaurant is unmatched in a fun, upbeat, happy to be here kind of way.
We had the calamari, cauliflower, classic burger, sweet potato fries, and the mini salted caramel dessert. Zero notes, everything was beyond delicious and definitely will be back for their daily bottomless pancakes :)
Lovely staff  - thanks Ahmedüòä and decent breakfast, with a brekkie bundle you get good price. Recommended.
Good food and good vibes. Our server Mo provided a great service!

First time. We reserved a dinner at Bills. But we went earlier in the day to see if it was nice. No waiting. We ordered sausage rolls and drinks.
The drinks were good but they brought us hamburger buns with slices of old dry sausages inside. When we inquired they said "that's our sausage rolls !". We paid for everything and left. Oh and cancelled our dinner reservations.

I had a booking for 12:15, arrived on time and had  to join a long queue. what is the point of booking a specific time when you cannot guarantee us a table ?? Me and my friend were seated only around 12:30, mind you we arrived earlier and were starving. please consider to organise a vacant space for a customer from the time they have booked a table ! it was very uncomfortable for us to wait on a hungry stomach, especially that we had to leave in less than 2h because we made other plans, therefore our experience was cut short at Bill‚Äôs simply because the table has not been organized from our initial booking time.
